definitions.body: give, acc. rei + [[ל]] pers. Da 2:48, Da 5:17, also (subj. God) Da 2:21, Da 2:23, Da 2:37, Da 2:38, Da 5:18, Da 5:19; give report Da 6:3 ([[ל]] pers.) ; give over, acc. pers. + [[בְּיַד]] ([[יַד]]
) Ezr 5:12 (subj. God); give up, surrender Da 3:28 (one’s body, acc.).
place, lay foundations Ezr 5:16 (Nab. also place Cooke:102, 1. 6 SAC:JQ 1904, 274; v. yhb
Schulth:Lex; and ZAW xxii (1902), 162; cf. D:WB 171).

definitions.title: Pe‘îl
definitions.body: (W:CG 224), be given, subj. rei, c. [[ל]] pers.:3 ms. [[יְהִיב]] DnDa 7:4, Da 7:6, [[יְהִב]] v:Da 7:14, v:Da 7:22, 3 fs. [[יְהִיבַת]] Da 5:28, Da 7:12, Da 7:27; 3 mpl.
